website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality mountable green screen that’s easy to store and set up and is still large enough for most uses.
pros: Made of wrinkle-resistant polyester that’s optimized for camera chroma keying
Can be mounted on a wall or ceiling
Pneumatic X-frame automatically locks the screen in place
Retracts into a hard case for easy storage
cons: Some users find that light can bleed through the screen if it’s too bright

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Excellent uniform color. Great thick/stiff fabric. Reasonably heavy duty construction. If I had one design request it would be that the side mounting screw holes were offset sufficiently to allow the screen to be mounted to a wall/beam/rafter without a standoff -- it looks like some attention was paid to this, but the clearance of the screen is not enough (I had to fabricate a standoff).
customer_reviews.author: sdb

customer_reviews.title: Green Screen that Disappears!
customer_reviews.text: I have another green screen on a stand, and although it's great for podcasting it is a terrible unwieldy monster of a thing to keep in my office. This attached nicely to the ceiling and rolls out of view when not in use. The size is great and the aspect ratio is better than the stand-mounted screen. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MzMax

customer_reviews.title: A little pricy but wrinkle-free
customer_reviews.text: It worked just fine. Two weeks before I ordered this one, I bought a cheaper one but it had a lot of wrinkles, which required me to iron them (seriously!). I did not bother to return that one so I ordered this one instead. It is a bit pricy but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: H. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Screen that works very well with OBS studio
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of presentations for clients before Covid19 and didn't have a green screen. I needed to demonstrate software and discuss proposals with my clients. I had to add a couple of blocks of 2x2 to move it out from the wall to clear some pictures behind me. I also added a string of LED lights on the roller which made the green screen work even better. The slow roll back up is really nice. Definitely recommend if you have a home office with a wall behind you.
customer_reviews.author: jbruffin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and great support from the company!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product and great support from the company! I had an issue with mine and the communication from El Gato was just fantastic, they offered to completely replace my unit but I ended up just keeping it because it was a super minor issue and it still works and looks fantastic. Best green screen on the market backed by great support. <3 El Gato
customer_reviews.author: A Real Person

customer_reviews.title: Best green screen available
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best green screens I have been able to find. It is well made, sturdy and has a great material. Most of the other solutions are cheaper and the fabric is very flimsy and fragile. This looks great and performs perfectly for making a seamless, realistic background!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better!
customer_reviews.text: It an awesome product. Good quality. Easy to use. And large. If your looking for a good size green screen for your stream, this is the one. I chose this one over the pop up Elgato because it was wider and wouldn't have to be directly behind my chair. Which makes it easier to light, not cast shadows, and still be in frame.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Townhill

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with dynamic backgrounds in Zoom meetings and it works great. Hung it from the ceiling with a pair of hooks so it can be extended and retracted with ease. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: andy2m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home office!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect for my new online work situation. Easy to pull down and works perfectly with Zoom. Allows for a much more professional looking background with clients. Couldn’t recommend this more!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Relatively wrinkle free - Tough fabric: expected to hold up for a long time - Can hang from rings or mount directly on a wall Cons - Retractor spring seems a bit weak - Mounting ring design demands your hooks (not included btw) be installed with high precision
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: I tried twice to purchase this and both times the unit arrived with dents. The first time there was even rust in it. I gave up trying to get it delivered without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good green screen
customer_reviews.text: It mounts easily, retracts well, green screen looks good, does as advertised. For my use, and being able to retract it only when using, is great in my small office space.
customer_reviews.author: Orangeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made, quality unit. I have it hanging from the ceiling, completely out of the way when not needed. The additional width over the floor standing model is a significant advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lim

customer_reviews.title: Parts not included
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the thing doesnt comenwith any way to install so if you are huying keel in mond youll need hardware
customer_reviews.author: theten

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but keep in mind focal length
customer_reviews.text: The green screen is enormous, but I put my camera too close to me, and the green screen too far away.. and it looks tiny in frame.. so keep that in mind when designing your setup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complains about this product, I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: KHALID S.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Thing
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty pricey, but well worth the money. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiril Valtchev

customer_reviews.title: Does not retract!
customer_reviews.text: After a little over week of use the green screen no longer retracts. Very frustrating especially during times like this
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Brenton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for serious streamers.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for streaming in a chair or full body with VR.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Solis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Green screen keying precision
customer_reviews.text: Works smoothly, stays in place and retracts very nicely when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Falls over!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about a week and the heavy metal case it comes in is an odd ovally shape, it tips over very easily with the slightest bump or draft. Best if used against a wall or with some kind of support behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Defective, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was going to use this for a video with a friend who is in town for a couple days, but that plan was ruined. It goes up all crooked and doesn't retract evenly either, it gets jammed and bunches up. It's held together by a bunch of rivets, many of which look mangled. Thought it would be nicer for the price. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LucasP

customer_reviews.title: The material is too bright and reflective,  does not work for professionals
customer_reviews.text: The material is too bright and reflective. It does not work for professionals. More than thirty years of experience in television media. I do not understand why so many good reviews. Tried all the possible ways even leaving only one light on and changing all the positions. I had to continue using my old green screen that despite having so many years still works much better than the cat. The only good thing about the cat (el gato) is the stand but the green screen uses a super reflective fabric and does not serve for real professional work. I hope you can offer a version for professionals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: EL MACHO BORICUA

customer_reviews.title: Falling over.
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdy and stood upright up until recently, after 5 months, when it's now tipping everytime I put it up. It hasn't fallen or gotten any external damage, just decided to not work anymore. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Ellinor

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Great quality only down side is I find it isn't wide enough
customer_reviews.author: Os Cranz

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup and convenient storage HIGHLY Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This Green Screen is pure awesomeness. As a Photographer I have been using lots of different background products over the years and this one is so simple. I just wish it was a bit longer if they offered a longer for more money I would gladly of paid extra. I doubt you can fit two people on this green screen streaming. Setup is a breeze on this and it's easy to put away. If you want something that can be put away quickly and setup fast you won't find ANYTHING better for this price. Similar products are about $300 +
customer_reviews.author: CrazyShopper918

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken, fluid/oil leaking out.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this screen, but upon trying to set it up for the first time, the screen wasn't able to stay up on its own. One side was sagging way more than the other side. When checking on the back, that is when I noticed fluid leaking from one of the cylinder supports. Then that drew my attention to the large stain caused by the fluid on the screen, ruining the screen. Unfortunately had to return the item, will try another one from some other company sometime in the future. Putting the green screen on hold for now after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical at first.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6"2' and the photos taken were of me standing up. You are able to get a full body photo with an extra 5-6 inches of room above your head. Though it was in the description and it was an often complaint I heard that it wasn't tall enough for the average 6 ft man. This is a lie. It's plenty tall enough for me. Could be a little wider. Other than that no complaints what so ever. I live in a really small room and this being a roll up item saves me so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: A good deal for the price, but some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The Elgato green screen (chroma key backdrop screen) is a really neat product. It rolls up neatly into a slim case, which stores nicely under my bed. The screen deploys and retracts smoothly, at least for now. It's not exactly lightweight, but it's not heavy either. About right for how big it is. One complaint: the extruded aluminum case lid is badly warped along the back edge (see photos), which makes it difficult to close. I've tried bending the lid straight, but it springs back, and unless I drill out the hinge rivets to remove the lid entirely and then replace them later, there's no good way to get enough leverage to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight S. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this green screen. I originally had a green back drop from my photography setup. It worked but it was too much to setup and take down. So I would just slide it off to the side but it still was visible. With this one, I can pull it up and push it back down. Also it's taunt. My original setup was not taunt so there would be wrinkles and there would be small shadows. No longer a problem. My only wish would be to make it a little bit wider. I have to zoom in closer. Not a big deal. All in all I love it. I would recommend it and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: This product is very convienient and it is super portable. I love how it retracts so easily and doesn't take up much space. It's my own fault for not paying attention but it is definitely not wide enough. You'll need to have your camera super close or else it won't fit as your entire background. I have figured out a way to use it sideways to avoid it not being wide enough. I recommend taking cardboard or a blanket or something that you can place behind you. Place it as far back as you'd expect your green screen and than measure the blanket so you know how big of a screen you need.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Best Green Screen I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This Elgato Green Screen is wonderful! You can use it for multiple scenarios. I use it indoors for Youtube videos, documentaries, interviews and music videos. It's long but portable and very easy to use. All you have to do is pull up on it to open and push down to close it. It takes me 10 seconds to open and start using my green screen. It comes in a built-in case with a handle and 2 legs underneath for stability. If you're looking for a green screen that you can put up on a few seconds, this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bino

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding green screen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Elgato green screen 9 months ago and have used it extensively (at least 3-7 times per week). It is extremely easy and fast to set up. It's easy and fast to collapse and set aside. When set up, the screen is sturdy on a carpet or floor. The screen height can be easily adjusted to whatever height you prefer and it stays in place immediately. The thickness of the green screen is ideal. I am absolutely delighted with this product and just purchased a second one for another office of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joseph Peck

customer_reviews.title: A mix of good and poor quality components
customer_reviews.text: This screen has a lot of parts, some of which are good quality including the case, the roller, the screen it's self, and the struts that hold it up. But these parts are assembled using very low quality bits, including the case latches which are extremely weak, the screen connection to the roller (it's starting to pop off already), the rivets holding the struts in place (very weak starting to come out) The other annoying thing is that it's not in wide screen format, so you have to zoom in and not use the top or bottom portions of the screen but only the middle strip. Its not worth it given the poor quality of many of the components.
customer_reviews.author: Davis S.

customer_reviews.title: Changing review on this after using for a few months. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.text: While this product is super easy to use & store. It comes with many flaws. The screen itself rocks back and forth almost as it it breaking from the bottom that holds the entire thing together. The hinges on the the case are very flimsy and ripped right out as you can see from pictures. I take very good care of this it sucks that it looks like the entire thing is being held together by cheap rivet pins other than screws or bolts.
customer_reviews.author: peter harris

customer_reviews.title: They work pretty good if you get two and stagger
customer_reviews.text: In a perfect world these would be made so you can attach as many as you might need together without any overlay but that’s not how they work. You will need to stagger them but it will allow you the 60° view rather than requiring the 90° view with the close-up. You need to move these close enough so the camera doesn’t pick up any issues with height and ideally these would’ve been an additional 6 inches tall. My wife wanted some thing that was easy to set up and take down that we could put in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect green screen!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on green screens and am very glad I chose this product. If you purchase this, be aware that there are "feet" that flip out on the bottom that help stabilize it. They are not readily apparent and you could miss them if you are not looking for them. The screen pulls up and retracts easily. The screen itself is very "clean" - no wrinkles that will show on your video. It is a little heavy/cumbersome, but even at 5'3" and 110 lbs, I can maneuver it to where I need to get it.
customer_reviews.author: S Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for creating teaching videos at home. It is easy to set up and take down. No assembly is required and it is sturdy and super easy to use. I put it up and take it down within seconds. I do have it against a wall so that nothing can blow it over but I do feel that even free standing without a wall behind it, it does have little legs that come out that brace it to stand up straight. I love this and think it is totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy VanGundy

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's a great screen that has the right amount of thickness and the right color to easily adapt to chroma key without needing anything directly behind it. You can easily take it down and store it away. That functionality is exceptional. Middle: Like any item relating to camera's it benefits from the right amount of lighting. Cons: Like any item relating to technology the price to performance is bad when going towards the high end. You could definitely put a manual green screen up and get it to function as good while also having be wider but... this is a fully functional all in one package that works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MWMullens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for streamers
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a streamer & had a large green screen set up in our room that stayed in place 24/7 and was a huge eye sore & hassle to get around. I was very excited when I found this collapsible green screen & purchased it for him as a gift. Best. Purchase. Ever. Now he can easily pull it up when it’s needed & collapse it when he’s done. It fits perfectly between the legs of our queen size bed so it can easily be hidden away when not in use. Definitely worth the price for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for streaming on Twitch.
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress how important lighting is when using a green screen. You need to eliminate the shadows behind you and ensure the screen is well lit. It's incredibly easy to pop up and down. I'm 5'2" and it goes well over my head. It's wider than I expected, but I'm glad. It allows you to have adequate space behind you so you don't knock it over. It's great. I love it. I tried a pop up one before this on a stand, and it just.... Wasn't as good. It was bulky and awkward. It took up more space. I was just trying to save the money. I'm glad I made the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bakingmecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough, too expensive, amazing idea and product other than that.
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. For wide angle lenses like the C922 or c920 it's difficult to fit the green screen in the frame and also get a good shot of streamer. Surprising since this is designed for streamers. Other than that it's super convenient and eliminates the wrinkle and setup time issues with other green screens. Too expensive and not wide enough but it's great other than that.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after trying on that attaches to a chair. This is far superior. It allows me to store it on the floor behind my desk, and I can pull it up for use very conveniently. It is a sturdy device, but it is one that should be handled carefully. It stands very sturdy. The footers make for a solid stance. Yanking the top handle or pulling the screen up too fast can seemingly damage the rolling mechanism. I would highly recommend to device. It is not light for transport, but for a more stationary use, it is great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Fastest, easiest setup, perfect wrinkle free screen
customer_reviews.text: This is one well thought through product. It sets up perfectly in seconds. Open up the two clips, and lift the reverse window shade. That's it. Closes up just as fast. It's long but you can place it on its end in a closet, so it really takes up less room than anything else you'd think of using. The screen is perfectly flat with no wrinkles. Definitely worth paying more for this well engineered screen vs paying less for tripods and folding screens. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: MHS1

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than three months
customer_reviews.text: Three months in the screen would no longer stand up. It was unusable. It was after the refund window and i waited 8+ days without a response from Elgato. Amazon agreed to provide me a refund due to their no response. When it worked, it was great! But it’s hard to use if it won’t stay up... Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Every Streamer NEEDS This.
customer_reviews.text: As a regular streamer who was always annoyed setting up a green screen, much less, trying to get all the wrinkles out. The Elgato Green screen is a god-like product and I don't use that term often. It's way bigger than expected, portal, light, and most of all, effective. If you stream, you NEED this. No more hassle with wrinkles, no more lighting frustration since it's completely flat and smooth, and overall, one of the best streaming products ever made. I'm shocked no one thought of this product sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sulzbach

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  It'd give it 10 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews, but felt compelled to given the quality of this green screen. I got the collapsable one and I'm so impressed for the quality for the money. Like I can't get over it. It's extremely rare to say that I think this should cost so much more than it does. It is study and easy to use. I'm a novice and only really need it for virtual presentations, but it's worked perfectly. I'm truly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Bookmark

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but kind of narrow
customer_reviews.text: The screen itself is great quality. The holder is also top quality. However, the width of it is narrow. That means the screen has to be right behind us and we have to be almost right next to the camera. We can't give it a lower star rating because it's not their fault. If you don't mind sitting right next to the camera with the screen right behind you, then the screen is perfect. It's good quality but narrow.
customer_reviews.author: TXCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want a portable green screen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best that one can hope for in a green screen. If I had a need for another one, I would buy another one of these. The design and functionality is a winning combination. I had to call Elgato about something not related to the screen and their customer service was great. If I did make recommendations, I would recommend that you but this if you have a green screen need.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-in-one green screen
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkle free every time, great green color and the best part is that it automatically sets itself up! You just pull the handle and the built in frame is setup on the back like an accordion that automatically keeps the green screen up. When you want to put it away, just press down from the top and it automatically collapses/rolls back into itself. I love how it’s an all in one green screen and case too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW JUST WOW
customer_reviews.text: This screen is everything I hoped it would be. We purchased as a birthday gift as our son loves to live stream. With just a little bit of ingenuity on his part he was up and going. Looks so amazing when you are literally floating on the screen. Such a nice investment to have. If you are considering a tip to know is that you are able to shrink the background around you so that nothing else is showing in the background. Oh and don't where green.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Well Built & great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed a lot of green screen alternatives before purchasing the Elgato Green Screen Collapsible. While more expensive than many of the alternatives I reviewed, I believe it is a great product worth the higher cost. It is extremely well built and very easy to set up in less than a minute. I expect its strong construction will give me many years of use. The space behind my desk chair (~2 feet) does not permit me to hang a screen attached to the walls or other similar attachment mechanisms. The Elgato gives me an easy to set up and take down with a stretched screen that has no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: beinghuman

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wants this green screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best!fast and easy, my NFL is so jealous, he wants this green screen and it’s sold it everywhere. amazing quality, great kickstands to steady it, and it’s soooooo smooth! We searched all over town for a second one and it’s taken over a month and the other company still hasn’t shipped his green screen! This one arrived quickly and works like a charm. Great item, Great seller! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very portable.
customer_reviews.text: While it has some weight to it, it is very portable. The legs bring it stability so make sure you rotate them perpendicular to the screen. In this setup, it could still blow over in a stiff wind of using it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Really fantastic - very well made
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic - very well made, solid, sturdy construction and VERY easy to use. I love that I can just slide it under the bed and within a few seconds I have a screen big enough for my seated play. Even for standing it can be effective, it just isn't all that wide - but for seated it's perfect. If you want to make your streams/videos more professional this is a great place to start. NOTE: Just don't forgetting lighting. The key to good chroma-key is bright and even lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact green screen
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall about this thing is it would be better if the green screen was at least 1 foot wider, preferably 2 feet wider. As is, with my webcam, it’s difficult to get and stay completely in frame. I can see past one of the edges when I use it at a comfortable distance behind me. If it had the extra foot or two width, I could have a little more breathing room while sitting in my chair between the screen and my desk. I really have to put it very close behind me to get only the green screen in frame. Other than that it works great and does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F.

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, l like the setup - very easy. The green screen works as advertised. On the negative side, It needs to be taller. I have my subjects stand about 5 feet in front of the screen to reduce the green halo that is picked up. My videos are of the bust (middle of chest up). I had a difficult time videoing a man 5'9" tall. In the image, there was no green above his head. The solution was simple. Have the subject sit. But that means that I will have a difficult time doing full body shots of anyone over 5'8". Regardless, I was able to create good videos using the green screen.
customer_reviews.author: Small time buyer

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it pulls up to extend...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot bigger and heavier than I thought it’d be, but that’s my fault for not measuring first. It’s sturdy, stands up nicely without tipping over, is pretty heavy, and extends up pretty high. I wish they made one that was 1ft-1.5ft, maybe even 2ft smaller across (width wise) so it would fit behind me better, but I didn’t read the dimensions so that’s my fault. I assumed size judging by photos. Overall, it’s a good green screen.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: To narrow for video conferencing
customer_reviews.text: The screen would be perfect if it was about a foot wider. Even with the screen directly behind my chair, it is too narrow for the camera on my laptop. It seems expensive, but the wider collapsible green screens are 4 times the prices. I'll probably switch to the Elgato pull down ceiling/wall mount screen which is 16.5 inches wider and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: rdagger

customer_reviews.title: Best green screen option for convenience!
customer_reviews.text: If you're tight on space and need something quick and easy to set up, take down, and store away, then this is by far the best option! The base is very sturdy, every part of this is well constructed, and the fabric is great at capturing light to provide an even color for chroma keying. No wrinkles, no static cling. This thing is perfect! The price is great as well. I looked at similar products that are traditionally used for trade shows and events, typically designed to have a logo printed on them, and they were nearly double the price of this. If you're looking to add some quality to your live stream, this is a must-buy!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: This Green Screen is Flawless
customer_reviews.text: As everything Elgato makes, this screen is literally top of its game. With a carrying handle on top of the case to a quick 2 second set up, this green screen is ready to go when you are. I thought it may be a little short on the "wide" aspect, but by actually using it, Its a fine size, just right. If you need a green screen but want something you can still take down for space reasons, look no father. Elgato has you covered and boy will they not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: David Bock

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true!!
customer_reviews.text: This green screen is just unbelievable!! I had this out of the box and totally set up within four minutes! Watch some of the videos on YouTube to see how easy this is to do. And the screen virtually comes out wrinkle-free. I've never had the occasion to transport a green screen, but this one can be ready to transport in less than two minutes. I've never been this excited about purchasing a green screen!!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl screen and large size.  Stores easily.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality and quite large. My favorite thing about it is the ability to store it under desk when not in use. The green screen is a heavy vinyl with great color. No wrinkles. The arms can get hung up a bit when closing just before its completely down, take your time and its a non issues, sometimes it just takes a little extra push down on the arms to get them to pop in the base. Screen is stable when extended. This thing is heavier than I expected. It is a bit expensive for what it is. I would buy it again just for the ability to store it quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm just too fat.
customer_reviews.text: This greenscreen backdrop is amazing. I don't use it often but when I do it is wonderful. I just would like to see more options in width. Currently, I have to bring the backdrop really close to my seat but having an "L" shaped desk makes that a little hard to accomplish. There should be more sizes that would match the consumer's needs
customer_reviews.author: Jeeniejolie

customer_reviews.title: Best Green Screen
customer_reviews.text: Love this green screen. Very easy to move around. Portable. Love the case that it comes in and every time I pull it up to use, its wrinkle free. Use this constantly. The only down side is if you are tall like myself (6'2) and are trying to shoot standing, you might have to put something under it to lift it a bit so your head stays in the green screen as well. other than that, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Indispensible for creating thumbnails
customer_reviews.text: I use this for creating thumbnails for my YT channel. This is one of the best purchases I have made in that regard. It sets up and packs up in seconds. It stores easily under a bed or in a spare room. It's tall with plenty of room on each side. I see people playing around with trying to get all the folds/curls out of blankets and sheets. This thing is perfect every time, I can't imagine how much time it's saved me. Would buy another one in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly Computers

customer_reviews.title: Used for a year now, zero issues.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding green screen. Extremely uniform color, anti-glare texture, minimum light bounce. Now, be aware, a green screen is only as good as the lights you use for it, but in ny setup (two softbox defuser lights, and myself seated about two and half feet in front of the screen) I get consistently crisp and clean keying in stream labs.
customer_reviews.author: James Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a used Elgato screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used and I was expecting like scratches but instead I got lock pins I had to install my self which resulted for me to manipulate it a bit for it to fit in which just felt and look crappy and unsafe for me to use the handle to carry around because the lock pins where installed by me and not trained workers
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good but fatal flaw - FALLS OVER
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe such a high quality and thoughtfully made product has such a stupid flaw. It will NOT stand on its own. You will need to hack put sturdy objects behind it to prevent it falling over. Otherwise it's great, and chroma keying works great
customer_reviews.author: AN734

customer_reviews.title: Too easy.
customer_reviews.text: How easy can this thing really be? Read the head line. I'm blown away on how easy this set up is the only thing missing is a built in lighting set up. The top gets good lighting from just about any over head light, the lower half need some help. If you guys really want to make the perfect all in one set up, find a way to get some LEDS at the bottom to light it up. But other than that, this thing is clean and easy to use. Been working with it for a few days and my videos look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: A.Pintor

customer_reviews.title: The single greatest screen you’ll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: First off, this product was greener than The Hulk after a SLIME dump at Nickelodeon. When you need a green screen, there is no place else to GO other than CORSAIR. This screen is perfect for when I lift heavy weights at the beach for my instagram and YouTube channels - except, I ain’t at the beach! I can do it all within the comfort of my Momma’s BASEMENT! If you need to upgrade your social media platform, then BUY this SCREEN, BRO! 10/10 Would buy again in a different color (such as black or grey)
customer_reviews.author: BlisSwole

customer_reviews.title: Good for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Last two years I've been traveling a lot, and I have to upload videos to my Youtube Channel, doesn't matter where I am. Changing too often the background of the videos it's not good for personal branding because the subscribers doesn't feel "at home" if every time there's a different background, they are not sure if that's your house, why are you traveling so much, etc. Using ElGato Green Screen it's easy to get always the same background without problems and even more important, without spending any time to mount a green screen. Also, I can travel with it and use it wherever I want. For me it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi Cor

customer_reviews.title: The ease of use and quick setup and take down of this is awesome. My complaints are that because of its width ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace my DIY screen i made with a pole and a big piece of fabric that spanned my whole room (about 12 feet wide). The ease of use and quick setup and take down of this is awesome. My complaints are that because of its width i have to position it directly behind me which makes it a pain to get out of my chair when i want to get up. A wider version would make this a 5 star product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Setup is super easy and the metal casing is nice. The legs are hidden with the case which is a plus. Nothing negative to say about it but my only advice would be to not over pay because of it being low stock. Wait for the manufacturer and not an overpriced 3rd party
customer_reviews.author: twitch.tv/8BitsOfGlory

customer_reviews.title: Really great and super easy!
customer_reviews.text: The set up and take down of this is so easy, literally all you do is pull the handle up and it stands on it's own and when your done it rolls right down into the case, absolutely no work involved. The case can be closed and locked and you can easily pick it up and carry it too. I use mine for online streaming which I do from a small space in my bedroom so being able to put it up and take it down in seconds is clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia K MacLauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent green screen. Easy set up and storage.
customer_reviews.text: Elgato makes quality products for video capturing and streaming. The green screen is sturdy and very easy to set up. You literally pull it out and it locks in place. To store it, you simply push it back down into its storage and you’re good to go! I used to have to get creative when hanging a green screen. This product made streaming so much easier and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro F.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for those lacking space!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small NYC studio apartment so space is limited for me. I have 14 foot ceilings so hanging something is a pain in the butt. This product allows me to have a Green Screen when I need it, and it stores right under my couch. Takes seconds to set up, seconds to put away! Superb quality! I had my doubts but to be honest I was very impressed and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new YouTuber, and I invested in this greenscreen because I want to get really creative with my videos. I haven't used it much yet, but so far I like it. I had previously bought cheapo greenscreen stands and clips and those didn't work out. I like that this quickly rolls up and down and is easily moved out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: RainManFTL

customer_reviews.title: I love it and use it every stream
customer_reviews.text: For a wrinkle free experience this is perfect! It goes up and down easily and is built into its own carrying case. It is however pretty large so I highly recommend measuring your space beforehand to see if it’ll fit decently in your room.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but too small for my needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this as a gift and I LOVED it! It was easy to set up, wrinkle free, extremely well made. Regretfully, I had to return it as it was too narrow for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient but Small.
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty nice and handy to move and setup. I just wish it was 2 feet wider. You really don’t have much space to move. I want to light it separately for a better key but it has to be very close to you.
customer_reviews.author: James Patton

customer_reviews.title: It sorks well and better if course with good lighting.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely perfect for live streaming. Super convenient, and easy to use or put away. Shipping was fast. Worked right out of the box. As long s you are responsible and using it as intended, not abusing it, this thing should last a very ling time. It feels very sturdy. Nit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: lives up to its reputation
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having half of my mancave taken over by a green screen, and I saw this puppy. all of the positive reviews helped me decide on it and im glad I did! this thing is sweet! pops up in seconds, and can be put away just as quick. all the materials feel/look very high quality. i'm very pleased with this product, thinking about buying a second one for my wife who also streams.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Build Quality, Great Screen, A Little Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, great quality but just be aware that this is going to require either the camera being close, or the screen bring REALLY close to the object in the camera. Again, great product, just be ready to deal with the green screen being very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it sets up and folds down in legitimately 2 seconds. This is pretty much exclusively for people who are sitting as it's barely taller than me (but I'm 6'4"). The one thing that sucks is that this thing goes out of stock all the time on amazon, it took a good 3 months for it to even be shipped to me. If it's out of stock here, you can purchase it off of el gato's webstore.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for recording in a small bedroom / office.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this green screen. It's easy to move, durable, and raises/lowers with minimal effort. Currently using it with OBS for screen recordings of software reviews so that I can show the desktop behind a video feed of me at the computer. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Widmann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for My LIVE Streams
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works well with my ecamm Live streaming software
customer_reviews.author: John Sarzoza Jr.

customer_reviews.title: but if you are standing and move your arms around ( like I do ) its not going to be wide ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this green screen is VERY high quality. You will be impressed with it. However, ​it is not for everyone. I think it is ideal if you are sitting while recording, but if you are standing and move your arms around ( like I do ) its not going to be wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Adam From YouTube

customer_reviews.title: This green screen is excellent! Set up is a breeze and the fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: This green screen is excellent! Set up is a breeze and the fabric is free from wrinkles or defects allowing for super easy chroma keying. I only wish is that it were about 6 - 8 inches wider so I could set it a little further behind me. It required some creative lighting in my space to reduce the shadows I create in the screen. Being able to set it up a little further away would make this easier. Overall I would recommend this product for anyone looking to chroma key in a small or shared space.
customer_reviews.author: Jdpipkin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: one of the best things i've bought on Amazon. This is how personal green screens are supposed to work. Hands down I would recommend this to anyone who wants a webcam green screen easily (EASILY) set it up, easily (EASILY) take it down and put it under the bed or behind the couch. I love this product. I wish they had little lights in the base and top to illuminate it -- but you know. that's maybe the next line of perfect fckn product from Elgato
customer_reviews.author: WicketWarwick

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is not a lightweight item. It has some weight to it, which is great. It works very well for what I purchased it for and has made my video game streaming 100% better since it allows the background to blend into the environment. It's also a little bigger than expected but it's worth the money since it's very easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient for me when I have video meetings or when I am streaming. And I can move it between rooms when I need to. As it's not recommended to store on it's end, so I don't. When it's not in use, I move it to against a wall to reduce a potential trip hazard. So I can set it up quickly for any last minute meetings, or after I have stowed it away for any length of time, I've put tape marks on my floor and I don't have to guess where I placed it previously.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: THE best green screen I have ever used in my entirety of live streaming, Elgato makes the best products on the market and this is definitely one of them! It’s incredibly easy to setup and move around, very robust construction and only takes seconds to prepare for my live stream where other screens would take up to 15 minutes to setup. If you are interested in an easy to setup, easy to store green screen this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works well for quick set up
customer_reviews.text: Photo attached intended to show you the green color. Image was cropped, making the screen look much much larger than it is. Works well for sitting interview. Not enough for standing if the talent is taller then 5’9 . Overall good for quick set up in studio or at a clients house.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great...
customer_reviews.text: So I need to set this sucker up right behind my chair for it to work. I mean right behind my chair where I can't even back up an inch. This is even with cropping my webcam. This thing has amazing storage and easy setup, but man is this thing narrow. I'm not sure what they were thinking with the dimensions on this thing. It is honestly the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, mobile, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time for teaching. It is an excellent, portable, durable green screen. It can be open up and closed very easily, so is ideal for mobile professional life. It stays reliably wrinkle-free despite a busy lifestyle. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Intentional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: Now, I store vertically in a closet. I wonder if that what causes the wrinkle on one side. It's not a big deal.. I wish you could change out the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: FSB

customer_reviews.title: Does start to wear out with repeated use
customer_reviews.text: Do you wish it was a little bit bigger Fort it’s Price but works great. I’ve had this for at least six months. it’s never given me any problems and I take it out or put it away about three times a week. But after about six months of this type of use it is starting to show it’s where. Im think by the time this year is over it might be getting to the point where I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon k.

customer_reviews.title: The Easiest Green Screen
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this green screen is how amazingly easy it is to use. It collapses into a sturdy frame. The frame itself has two feet that come out to keep the green screen from moving once expanded. I have not had it wrinkle on me and it looks great for creating videos or use for photos. I'm able to remove the background from my images/videos very easily. Sometimes its not wide enough for my projects. Depending on the camera being used, the lens can be too wide so it captures beyond the green screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rowell

customer_reviews.title: All in one portable
customer_reviews.text: This makes life a lot easier. I'm able to put this in front of my desk top, move it around with my laptop or go out with my camera. Slide this under the bed, put it in the closet or behind the couch for easy storage. The convenience of this green screen is state of the art. Videos are top notch and crisp. If your video editing and or streaming this is a great grab move it around without pains and keep your green screen nice.
customer_reviews.author: mariel perry

product_meta.title: Elgato Green Screen MT - Mountable chroma key panel for background removal, auto-locking and self-rewinding, wrinkle-resistant chroma-green fabric, robust metal casing
product_meta.description: A dedicated chroma key surface that requires zero floor space, Green Screen MT strikes the perfect balance between sleek construction and pro performance. Mount Green Screen MT on your wall or ceiling, pull the handle down to any position, and let the precision roller automatically lock your screen in place. Panoramic dimensions cover your entire height and wingspan. Premium fabric ensures a wrinkle-free spread, while optimized chroma green guarantees the cleanest key you can get. It’s a wrap? Give the handle a tug and the screen will automatically disappear into its protective metal casing.
feature_bullets: Instant immersion: Wrinkle-resistant Green screen optimized for camera Chroma keying
Ultra-quick deployment: Set up and pack up in seconds; Material: 100% polyester
Pop-up Tech: Lift and let the pneumatic X-frame automatically lock the screen in place
Concealable design: Retract into the hard case and stash out of sight

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
